participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

su_crpf_avail_1.Description: If you wanted to get some beer, wine, or hard liquor (for example vodka, whiskey, or gin), how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_2.Description: If you wanted to get some cigarettes, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_3.Description: If you wanted to get some electronic nicotine or vaping products, such as e-cigarettes, vape pens, or Juuls,  how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_4.Description: If you wanted to get some marijuana, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_6.Description: Is medical marijuana" (marijuana prescribed by a doctor) legal in your state? " | 1=Yes; 0=No; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_7.Description: If you wanted to get medical marijuana from someone with a prescription, how easy would it be? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_8.Description: If you wanted to get a prescription for yourself for medical marijuana, how easy would it be? | 1=Very hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_9.Description: How many of your parents, friends, or other family members have a medical marijuana prescription? | 0=0; 1=1-3; 2=4-6; 3=7-9; 4=10 or more people; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_5.Description: If you wanted to get some drug like cocaine, LSD, or amphetamines, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_10.Description: If you wanted to get liquid, sprays, and gases that people sniff or inhale to get high (such as gasoline, glue, and nitrous oxide), how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_11.Description: If you wanted to get prescription pain relievers (such as Vicodin, hydrocodone, or Oxycontin; not over the counter drugs like Tylenol) that were not prescribed to you by a doctor, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_12.Description: If you wanted to get prescription anxiolytics or tranquilizers (such as Xanax and Ativan) that were not prescribed to you by a doctor, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

su_crpf_avail_13.Description: If you wanted to get prescription stimulants (such as Adderall or Ritalin) that were not prescribed to you by a doctor, how easy would it be for you to get some? | 1=Very Hard; 2=Sort of hard; 3=Sort of easy; 4=Very easy; 999=Don't know

crpf_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event_name_number] > '21'

crpf_device.Description: Youth's Device: | 1=Phone Screen ; 2=Tablet/iPad Screen ; 3=Computer Screen  [crpf_remote(2)] = ''1'' or [crpf_remote(3)] = ''1''
